game.name: Train Simulator: Frankfurt S-Bahn Rhein Main Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience a unique taste of historic Frankfurt by diving into two distinct lines of the network, the S5 and the S6.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience a unique taste of historic Frankfurt by diving into two distinct lines of the network, the S5 and the S6.
